label: 位記
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Diplomas or documents conferring rank (kurai) on officials. Civil officials received them from the Ministry of Ceremonial (Shikibushō ), military officials from the Ministry of War (Hyōbushō ). [位、式部省、兵部省]
